turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order something from Bosses Pizza can you put in an order for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure I can just let me know what you want and where I need to order like the location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fort Worth 76108 and I will look at the menu real quick.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay take your time no problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay is the Bosses on 6059 Lake Worth Blvd, Fort Worth, TX 76135 okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a small thin crust pizza, with black olives and pepperoni only.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have them add extra cheese to please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay no problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay putting in the order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great thanks so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will you be using paypal or credit card?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Credit Card please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay submitted and it's under your name for pick up in about 25 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect, thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem have a great night !!!

items.name: 6059 Lake Worth Blvd, Fort Worth, TX 76135
